data.message: I've one more question my question is, How to get verified badge on Facebook profile? Facebook

replies.message: Hi Hossam. Verification is rolling out slowly and may not be available to you yet. However, you can see if your Page is eligible for verification by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2zMNpJV. We hope this helps! -Tenaya
I have entered the link repeatedly but what I find is this feature is not currently available My current question is what is required so I can put that label on my personal page on Facebook
Facebook how are you still not responding to my messages about my account. But you continue to answer everyone else’s
Marshall Boyd Unfortunately, but... did you read everything I wrote?
The page link has been changed, but he not delete pictures and videos with me, I can prove it's my page. I hope facebook will see this conversation...  My page has 100k+ and I'm an admin since 2013.
Hossam are u a famous person?
Shakira Famous among my friends and my country and this is enough for me
Shakira My friends have a confirmation of the page though they do not fall under the celebrity list
